simulation.translation[0].definitions[0]: the activity of producing conditions which are similar to real ones, especially in order to test something, or the conditions that are produced
a computer simulation used to train airline pilots
a simulation of a rainforest environment
simulation.translation[1].definitions[0]: an activity or situation that produces conditions which are not real, but have the appearance of being real, used especially for testing something
A computer simulation allows project engineers to study in detail the manufacturing process operations at the factory site.
